metadata.name: Sample QA Dataset
metadata.description: Example test cases for RAG evaluation

test_cases.question: What is the refund policy?
test_cases.ground_truth: Full refund within 30 days of purchase with original receipt.

test_cases.question: How do I reset my password?
test_cases.ground_truth: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and enter your email address. You will receive a reset link within 5 minutes.

test_cases.question: What payment methods are accepted?
test_cases.ground_truth: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, and bank transfers.

test_cases.question: How do I contact customer support?
test_cases.ground_truth: Contact customer support via email at support@example.com or call 1-800-EXAMPLE. Support is available 24/7.

test_cases.question: What are the shipping options?
test_cases.ground_truth: Standard shipping (5-7 business days), Express shipping (2-3 business days), and Overnight shipping (next business day) are available.

test_cases.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
test_cases.ground_truth: Go to Account Settings > Subscription > Cancel Subscription. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period.

test_cases.question: What is the maximum file upload size?
test_cases.ground_truth: The maximum file upload size is 100MB for standard accounts and 500MB for premium accounts.

test_cases.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
test_cases.ground_truth: Go to Security Settings > Two-Factor Authentication > Enable. You can use an authenticator app or SMS verification.

test_cases.question: What happens to my data if I delete my account?
test_cases.ground_truth: All personal data is permanently deleted within 30 days. Anonymized usage data may be retained for analytics.

test_cases.question: How do I export my data?
test_cases.ground_truth: Go to Account Settings > Data > Export. You can download all your data in JSON or CSV format within 24 hours.
